title: The School
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 18 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: In The School, students use photographs to identify the parts of a school. A simple map of the school is also included. The simple repetitive phrases, supportive photos, and use of the high-frequency word the make this book perfect for the beginning reader.
meta: art, classroom, gym, library, lunchroom, music, playground, room, school
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Capitalization : Identify capital letters at the beginning of sentences
